entry.title: The Wider Black Sea Region: A Romanian Perspective- Gheorghe Magheru

media:group.media:title: The Wider Black Sea Region: A Romanian Perspective- Gheorghe Magheru
media:group.media:description:
In a speech titled โThe Wider Black Sea Region in the Context of the Global Crisisโ, veteran Romanian diplomat and former Ambassador to the Council of Europe Gheorghe Magheru discusses what can be learned about state-building in the South Caucasus from the experiences of the other countries in the wider Black Sea region. Magheru delivered his talk at the conference "Gathering Storm: Regional Security in the South Caucasus Amid the Global Order Crisis" organized by the Caucasus Institute in Yerevan on March 21, 2025.

entry.title: ีีธีฟีกีฌีธึีฟ ึีธีฉีธึีซีฏโค ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีซ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฟีฅึีฝีฟีธึีด

media:group.media:title: ีีธีฟีกีฌีธึีฟ ึีธีฉีธึีซีฏโค ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีซ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฟีฅึีฝีฟีธึีด
media:group.media:description:
ิปีถีนีบีซีฝีซี ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีตีซีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึ ีฏีกีถ ึ ีฏีฌีซีถีฅีถ ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีธึีด ีฃีฌีธีขีกีฌ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฟีฅึีฝีฟีธึีดึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฐีกึึีจ ีดีฅีฏ ีฐีกึีฉีกีฏีธึีด ีงึ ีฐีกีพีกึีฅีฌ ีกีผีกีปีกีฟีกึ ึีธึีฑีกีฃีฅีฟีถีฅึีซ, ีฃีซีฟีถีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซึ, ีึีกีฝีฟีกีถีซึ, ินีธึึึีซีกีตีซึ, ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซึ ึ ีกีตีฌ ีฅึีฏึีถีฅึีซึึ
ีีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีฃีซีฟีกีชีธีฒีธีพีจ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีฅีฌ ีงึ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีซ ีซีถีฝีฟีซีฟีธึีฟีจี ยซีีฅึีฃึีกีพีฅีฌีธีพ ีฐีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีตีกีถ ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ึ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃ ีฟีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ึ ึีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีฑึีกีพีธึีดีกีถ ีดีฅีปยป ีฎึีกีฃึีซ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีธึีด, ีธึีจ ึีซีถีกีถีฝีกีพีธึีพีธึีด ีง ีีซีกึีตีกีฌ ินีกีฃีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีดีกีถ ีกีปีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีทึีปีกีถีกีฏีธึีดี ีิน ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ:
ีีกึีฟีซ 21-ีซีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีพีกีฎ ีฃีซีฟีกีชีธีฒีธีพีจ ีฏึีธึีด ีงึ ยซีีธีฟีกีฌีธึีฟ ึีธีฉีธึีซีฏโค ีีกึีกีพีกีตีซีถ ิฟีธีพีฏีกีฝีซ ีฟีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีกีตีซีถ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฃีฌีธีขีกีฌ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีกีฏีกึีฃีซ ีณีฃีถีกีชีกีดีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฟีฅึีฝีฟีธึีดยป ีญีธึีกีฃีซึีจึ
What security challenges is the South Caucasus facing and expected to face in the context of a global order crisis? The issue brought together leading experts and scholars from Armenia, Georgia, Turkey, Azerbaijan, and beyond onto a single platform.
The international conference was organized by the Caucasus Institute within the framework of the project โEngaging Society and Government in Armenia in Developing an Agenda for a Secure Region,โ funded by the UK International Development from the UK government.
Held on March 21, the conference was titled โGATHERING STORM: REGIONAL SECURITY OF THE SOUTH CAUCASUS IN THE CONTEXT OF THE CRISIS OF THE GLOBAL ORDER.

entry.title: Arrests, intimidation of opposition candidates ahead of Gyumri election

media:group.media:title: Arrests, intimidation of opposition candidates ahead of Gyumri election
media:group.media:description:
๐ Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan escalates his long-standing feud with the countryโs three former presidents with another live debate challenge. ๐ Opposition alliances sound the alarm in Gyumri following office raids and arrests of members ahead of a tight municipal election this weekend. ๐ CivilNet spoke to border residents who have recently been hearing shots from Azerbaijani side. They say they feel safer with the EU monitors there, a group Baku demands be removed. ๐ Turkish and Armenian consuls in Aleppo, Syria meet in a rare diplomatic exchange between the two nations.

entry.title: Turning the tables on Bakuโs information warfare

media:group.media:title: Turning the tables on Bakuโs information warfare
media:group.media:description:
In this episode of Insights, Eric Hacopian focuses on the issue of disinformation by Baku and the need for Armenians to be more critical before spreading such news. He gives recent examples of how Azerbaijan tries to control the narrative by purchasing articles in legitimate-sounding outlets and names one of the questionable characters who assists the process. He encourages Armenians to adopt a skeptical lens for all news coming from their countryโs enemies, and to go on the media offensive instead of merely reacting to dubious stories.

entry.title: Bridging Armenia and Georgia through stories #shorts

media:group.media:title: Bridging Armenia and Georgia through stories #shorts
media:group.media:description:
Though neighbors, Armenians and Georgians know little about each other. A special night at the Woods Center in Yerevan, hosted by the PEN Centers of Armenia and Georgia, brought authors and artists together for a cultural dialogue. Featuring the new translation of Georgian writer Tamta Melashviliโs novel Counting Out into Armenia and the electrifying โ7 Voices, 7 Soundsโ concert, the event highlighted the power of literature and music to connect beyond borders.

entry.title: Armenia in the Meat Grinder of Geopolitics: Alexander Iskandaryan

media:group.media:title: Armenia in the Meat Grinder of Geopolitics: Alexander Iskandaryan
media:group.media:description:
In his talk titled โArmenia in the Meat Grinder of Geopolitics,โ political scientist Alexander Iskandaryan discusses the recent dramatic changes to Armenia's foreign policy which have occurred due to external circumstances, while the structure of its domestic has remained unchanged. Iskandaryan delivered the talk at the conference "Gathering Storm: Regional Security in the South Caucasus Amid the Global Order Crisis," organized by the Caucasus Institute in Yerevan on March 21, 2025.

ินีฅีฒีซีถีฅึีจ ึีธีญีกึีซีถีฅีฌ ีฐีธึีคีกีตีกีฎีกีผีฅึีธีีพ, ีฉีฅี ีธีนึ ิตึึีกีถีธึีด ีดีฅีฏ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีผีกีป ีฝีฏีฝีพีกีฎ ีฎีกีผีฅึีซ ึีธีญีกึีซีถีธึีดีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีพีฅึ ีถีกึ ีกีตีฝ ีฟีกึีซ, ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึ ีขีธีฒีธึีถีฅึีจี ึีฝึ ีีกึีฟีซ 20-ีซึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีบีฅีฟีกึีกีถีซ ยซิฟีกีถีกีนีกีบีกีฟีธึีด ึ ีทึีปีกีฏีก ีดีซีปีกีพีกีตึีซ ีบีกีฐีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ินีธึีดีกีถีตีกีถ ึีธีฒีธึีธึีด ีฐีฅีผีกึึีฅึี ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีซึีฅีถึ ีฅีถ ีกีฝีธึีดี ีฏีฅีถีฝีธึีถีกีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฏีธึึึีกีฎ 80 ีฎีกีผ ีธึ ึีธีญีกึีฅีถีจ ีฟีถีฏีฅึ 95-ีจ. ึีฝ 34-ีจ ีคีฅีผ ีฏีฟีถีฏีพีซึ ิฟีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ ิฑึีดีฅีถ ิฒีฅีฃีธีตีกีถีจ ีบีถีคีธึีด ีงี ีฐีฅีผีกึีถีธึีด ีฅีถ ีดีซีกีตีถ ีกีถีกีผีธีฒีป ีธึ ีฎีฅึ ีฎีกีผีฅึีจึ ีีกีฒีกึีกึีซีถีฅึีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีธึีด ีฅีถ ีบีถีคีฅีฌ, ีธึ ีถีกึ ีกีผีธีฒีปีถีฅึีถ ีฅีถ ีฐีฅีผีกึีพีธึีดึ

media:group.media:description:
ยซีีฟีซีฃีฅีถยป (Shtigen) ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีญีธึีดีขีจ ีธึีธีทีฅีฌ ีง ีผีฅีฝีธึึีฝีถีฅึ ีถีฅึีฃึีกีพีฅีฌ ีฏีกีบีซีฟีกีฌีซ ีทีธึีฏีกีตีซึ ึ ีฉีธีฒีกึีฏีธึีด ีง 1 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดีซ ีบีกึีฟีกีฟีธีดีฝีฅึี 12,75% ีฅีฏีกีดีฟีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีดีขึ ยซีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีซยป ีฟีกีฒีกีพีกึีธึีด ีจีถีฏีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ-ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ ีีกีตีฏ ีีฅีฏีตีกีถีจ ีบีกีฟีดีธึีด ีง ีซึีฅีถึ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ึ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีถีธึีด, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีง ีฏีธึีบีธึีกีฟีซีพ ีฏีกีผีกีพีกึีดีกีถ ีฉีกึีกีถึีซีฏ ีฝีฏีฆีขีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ีถีฅึีคึีธึีดีจ ีธึีธีทีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีฏีกีตีกึีธึีดีจ ีคีกึีฑีถีธึีด ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีธึีกีฏีตีกีฌ ึ ีฏีทีผีกีคีกีฟีพีกีฎ:
